description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.0M
  in 2019-2020 on contracts with Dawson Construction. The average
  contract duration was 0.93 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $5.2M. The longest
  contract was 1.58 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $9.8M.
